name: Two Deaths and a Funeral
description:
Explore the graveyard, kill the reanimated creatures, collect the souls and don't let your flame wither out.

Theme "Two"

The way i used the theme was to have all the enemies in the world be reanimated and you have to kill them a second time and collect there soul.

Features
  • Procedually animated characters
  • Enemy limb dismemberment
  • Physic based combat
Controls
  • WASD - Player Movement
  • Space - Player Jump
  • Left Mouse - Attack
  • Right Mouse - Dash

Follow me on twitter to keep updated

Made in 48 hours for the United Game Jam 2020

Assets used:
Fence Model, Trees, Rock, Bush, Sounds, Music
